responsibilities: Delivered exceptional customer service by identifying client needs and providing personalized product recommendations, resulting in a 15% increase in repeat customer visits.
Managed high-volume point-of-sale transactions and maintained accurate cash drawer balances daily.
Collaborated with the visual merchandising team to organize floor displays and ensure seasonal inventory was showcased effectively.
Consistently met and exceeded monthly sales targets through proactive engagement and upselling techniques.
Assisted in daily store operations, including inventory replenishment and maintaining garment organization in the fitting room area.
Shadowed senior sales staff to learn effective conflict resolution and customer retention strategies.
Processed incoming shipments and organized stockroom layout to improve team efficiency during peak hours.
